idlastro/

tab_null.pro


top source tab_null

result = tab_null(values)

NAME: TAB_NULL PURPOSE: function to locate null values within a vector of values from an STSDAS table.

CALLING SEQUENCE result = tab_null(values)

INPUTS: values - data value(s)

OUTPUTS: a boolean variable is returned with the same length as values. 1 indicates that the corresponding value was null

OPERATIONAL NOTES: Boolean columns in an STSDAS table does not presently have the capability to flag null values.

HISTORY: version 1 D. Lindler April 1989 Converted to IDL V5.0 W. Landsman September 1997

Parameters

values
